answers.answer: Hello,what you are describing could be due to any of a number of causes and we don't have enough information to give more than very general advice.Suggest you go to your doctor, discuss what you've been feeling and ask for a checkup.They should do Complete Blood Count (check for anaemia), and also check thryoid, blood sugars, blood pressure, etc.Let us know how you go.  Hope you will be feeling better soon.

question: i hhad hot flashes for about a month now ive been feeling dizzy and my stomach has been fluttering and i have had a rash on my face that wont go away what is wrong with me
title: diabetes
